page.title: 15Transport - South Wendron
page.content: Our block has one main road running through it, the A394 which links the towns of Falmouth and Helston. This runs diagonally across our block from NE to SW. It has one local bus service which uses it, plus an express coach service to Exeter and beyond each day. Recently there have been a lot of road improvements carried out on this road. The B3297 Helston to Redruth road just enters our block in the extreme west. It is still very narrow and full of bends. There is a bus service on this road, but there are not many buses! Most people in our area live off the main roads and are quite isolated, so most have their own car, although a lot of elderly people have to rely on buses and this can be very difficult for them.
